name: Nutcracker story
description:
Our sentient Nutcracker discovers one morning that the young child in the household has been kidnapped! It's up to our brave little Nutcracker to crack this case!

I KNOW THERES A TYPO IN THE SCREENSHOT ITS FIXED IN THE GAME IM JUST 2 LAZY TO REDO THE SCREENSHOT😭

controls

WASD/ARROW KEYS to move/navigate

E, SPACE, Z, ENTER to interact

SHIFT to run

SPACE or X to jump

hold RIGHT CLICK to adjust camera (the level of camera control varies by map)

MOUSE WHEEL/'T' & 'G' keys to zoom in/out

TAB, ESCAPE, M to open menu

Development info:

This game was made with the utmost focus on learning the newly released game-development engine "RPG developer Bakin" (in early access)

I technically made it for the santa cruz ballet nutcracker jam of 2022... but since the Jam has a wholesome, all-ages audience, I decided not to  submit this to the Jam. The game was still made in less than 21 days in accordance with the Jam's timeframe.

This is the first time I've ever been able to work in a 3D space + concern myself with a camera. I experiment with a handful of different camera angles + amount of player control over the camera, so the camerawork isn't the best. I hope the story itself is amusing/entertaining enough that you'll forgive all sins 🙏
